N = int(input())
A = list(map(int, input().split()))
B = list(map(int, input().split()))

ans = 0
for i in range(N):
    if A[i] < B[i]:
        ans += A[i]
        B[i] -= A[i]
        A[i] = 0
    else:
        ans += B[i]
        A[i] -= B[i]
        B[i] = 0

    if A[i] < B[i+1]:
        ans += A[i]
        B[i+1] -= A[i]
        A[i] = 0
    else:
        ans += B[i+1]
        A[i] -= B[i+1]
        B[i+1] = 0

print(ans)
